verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Samuel<WH8050>, How long wilt thou mourn<WH56> for Saul<WH7586>, seeing I have rejected<WH3988> him from reigning<WH4427> over Israel<WH3478>? fill<WH4390> thine horn<WH7161> with oil<WH8081>, and go<WH3212>, I will send<WH7971> thee to Jesse<WH3448> the Beth-lehemite<WH1022>: for I have provided<WH7200> me a king<WH4428> among his sons<WH1121>.

And Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559>, How can I go<WH3212>? if Saul<WH7586> hear<WH8085> it, he will kill<WH2026> me. And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559>, Take<WH3947> an heifer<WH1241><WH5697> with thee<WH3027>, and say<WH559>, I am come<WH935> to sacrifice<WH2076> to the LORD<WH3068>.
And call<WH7121> Jesse<WH3448> to the sacrifice<WH2077>, and I will shew<WH3045> thee what thou shalt do<WH6213>: and thou shalt anoint<WH4886> unto me him whom I name<WH559> unto thee.

And Samuel<WH8050> did<WH6213> that which the LORD<WH3068> spake<WH1696>, and came<WH935> to Beth-lehem<WH1035>. And the elders<WH2205> of the town<WH5892> trembled<WH2729> at his coming<WH7125>, and said<WH559>, Comest<WH935> thou peaceably<WH7965>?

And he said<WH559>, Peaceably<WH7965>: I am come<WH935> to sacrifice<WH2076> unto the LORD<WH3068>: sanctify<WH6942> yourselves, and come<WH935> with me to the sacrifice<WH2077>. And he sanctified<WH6942> Jesse<WH3448> and his sons<WH1121>, and called<WH7121> them to the sacrifice<WH2077>.
¶ And it came to pass, when they were come<WH935>, that he looked<WH7200> on Eliab<WH446>, and said<WH559>, Surely the LORD's<WH3068> anointed<WH4899> is before him.

But the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Samuel<WH8050>, Look<WH5027> not on his countenance<WH4758>, or on the height<WH1364> of his stature<WH6967>; because I have refused<WH3988> him: for the LORD seeth not as man<WH120> seeth<WH7200>; for man<WH120> looketh<WH7200> on the outward appearance<WH5869>, but the LORD<WH3068> looketh<WH7200> on the heart<WH3824>.
Then Jesse<WH3448> called<WH7121> Abinadab<WH41>, and made him pass<WH5674> before<WH6440> Samuel<WH8050>. And he said<WH559>, Neither hath the LORD<WH3068> chosen<WH977> this.
Then Jesse<WH3448> made Shammah<WH8048> to pass by<WH5674>. And he said<WH559>, Neither hath the LORD<WH3068> chosen<WH977> this.

Again, Jesse<WH3448> made seven<WH7651> of his sons<WH1121> to pass<WH5674> before<WH6440> Samuel<WH8050>. And Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> unto Jesse<WH3448>, The LORD<WH3068> hath not chosen<WH977> these.

And Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> unto Jesse<WH3448>, Are here all<WH8552> thy children<WH5288>? And he said<WH559>, There remaineth<WH7604> yet the youngest<WH6996>, and, behold, he keepeth<WH7462> the sheep<WH6629>. And Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> unto Jesse<WH3448>, Send<WH7971> and fetch<WH3947> him: for we will not sit down<WH5437> till he come<WH935> hither<WH6311>.

And he sent<WH7971>, and brought him in<WH935>. Now he was ruddy<WH132>, and withal<WH5973> of a beautiful<WH3303> countenance<WH5869>, and goodly<WH2896> to look to<WH7210>. And the LORD<WH3068> said<WH559>, Arise<WH6965>, anoint<WH4886> him: for this is he.

Then Samuel<WH8050> took<WH3947> the horn<WH7161> of oil<WH8081>, and anointed<WH4886> him in the midst<WH7130> of his brethren<WH251>: and the Spirit<WH7307> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH6743> upon David<WH1732> from that day<WH3117> forward<WH4605>. So Samuel<WH8050> rose up<WH6965>, and went<WH3212> to Ramah<WH7414>.
¶ But the Spirit<WH7307> of the LORD<WH3068> departed<WH5493> from Saul<WH7586>, and an evil<WH7451> spirit<WH7307> from the LORD<WH3068> troubled<WH1204> him.
And Saul's<WH7586> servants<WH5650> said<WH559> unto him, Behold now, an evil<WH7451> spirit<WH7307> from God<WH430> troubleth<WH1204> thee.

Let our lord<WH113> now command<WH559> thy servants<WH5650>, which are before<WH6440> thee, to seek out<WH1245> a man<WH376>, who is a cunning<WH3045> player<WH5059> on an harp<WH3658>: and it shall come to pass, when the evil<WH7451> spirit<WH7307> from God<WH430> is upon thee, that he shall play<WH5059> with his hand<WH3027>, and thou shalt be well<WH2895>.
And Saul<WH7586> said<WH559> unto his servants<WH5650>, Provide<WH7200> me now a man<WH376> that can play<WH5059> well<WH3190>, and bring<WH935> him to me.

Then answered<WH6030> one<WH259> of the servants<WH5288>, and said<WH559>, Behold, I have seen<WH7200> a son<WH1121> of Jesse<WH3448> the Beth-lehemite<WH1022>, that is cunning<WH3045> in playing<WH5059>, and a mighty<WH1368> valiant man<WH2428>, and a man<WH376> of war<WH4421>, and prudent<WH995> in matters<WH1697>, and a comely<WH8389> person<WH376>, and the LORD<WH3068> is with him.
¶ Wherefore Saul<WH7586> sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> unto Jesse<WH3448>, and said<WH559>, Send<WH7971> me David<WH1732> thy son<WH1121>, which is with the sheep<WH6629>.

And Jesse<WH3448> took<WH3947> an ass<WH2543> laden with bread<WH3899>, and a bottle<WH4997> of wine<WH3196>, and a<WH259> kid<WH1423><WH5795>, and sent<WH7971> them by<WH3027> David<WH1732> his son<WH1121> unto Saul<WH7586>.
And David<WH1732> came<WH935> to Saul<WH7586>, and stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> him: and he loved<WH157> him greatly<WH3966>; and he became his armourbearer<WH5375><WH3627>.
And Saul<WH7586> sent<WH7971> to Jesse<WH3448>, saying<WH559>, Let David<WH1732>, I pray thee, stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> me; for he hath found<WH4672> favour<WH2580> in my sight<WH5869>.

And it came to pass, when the evil spirit<WH7307> from God<WH430> was upon Saul<WH7586>, that David<WH1732> took<WH3947> an harp<WH3658>, and played<WH5059> with his hand<WH3027>: so Saul<WH7586> was refreshed<WH7304>, and was well<WH2895>, and the evil<WH7451> spirit<WH7307> departed<WH5493> from him.
